TextView.android:text:
U-Note
 This app is going to identify the text in a photo and translate it into the language that you need.

step1: open your camera (need to allowed app access the camera).

sep2: click the 'take a photo' button to take a photo.

The text in the image will be automatically recognized if you get an error, please take another photo.

step3: click the 'translate' button and choose a language you need

then the text will be translated.
